spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Coverage-TrustPod
spec_data.Description:
This is a Pod::Coverage subclass (actually, a subclass of
Pod::Coverage::CountParents) that allows the POD itself to declare certain
symbol names trusted.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:15:20 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Allow a module's pod to contain Pod::Coverage hints
